name: Six O'Clock High
description:
Is it a bird? Is it a plane? YES, it's a plane!

Six O'Clock High is a chaotic new aerial dogfighting game. Take to the skies with super easy and intuitive controls, luscious unique graphics and a thirst for gunpowder!

It's all about becoming an aerial ninja by piloting your plane throughout waves of increasingly skilled enemies. The best fighter aces will be sent against you, do you have what it takes to win the day?

Earn upgrade points after each wave to spend on 14 different aircraft upgrades. From titanium armour and rockets to eye exams and a full English breakfast. Yes you read that correctly.

Now get to it pilot! We need you in the war effort!

Features:

-14 Awesome aircraft upgrades

-Global Online High Scores across multiple platforms

-Easy, intuitive touch controls- no buttons or on-screen sticks.

-Beautiful vivid graphics

-Electro swing soundtrack

-Full GameCenter integration with achievements &amp; leaderboard.

You can view the trailer here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iRmDk34Om0A
